data.Name: Uplight
data.Tagline: The new leader in delivering a modern customer energy experience and accelerating the clean energy ecosystem.
data.About:
Uplight is the leading provider of end-to-end customer-centric technology solutions dedicated solely to serving the energy ecosystem. More than 80 utilities around the globe use Uplight solutions to power their customer energy experience.

Uplight creates a more sustainable future by empowering customers in a way that the sum is greater than the partsâ€”bringing together all of the pieces of customer energy action management, residential and commercial.
